location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No.905 of 1865 from Charles Gonne, Acting Secretary to Government, Political Department, Bombay to The Political Resident in the Persian Gulf

mods.abstract: Letter thanking Pelly for the information he supplied in relation to the proposed extension of the Mekran line from Gwadar to Bunder Abbas [Bandar Abbas] and informing Pelly of the wider circulation he intended for the report.
